languages.text: {n}Заметив Кибеллу, Наместник сразу скучнеет. Осторожно, не делая резких движений, он протирает очки и словно невзначай убирает руку под стол.{/n}

{n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив Кибеллу, Наместник сразу скучнеет. Осторожно, не делая резких движений, он протирает очки и словно невзначай убирает руку под стол.{/n}

{n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al fijarse en Kibellah, Vladaym adopta una expresión aburrida. Con cuidado y sin movimientos bruscos, se limpia las gafas y, con gesto distraído, coloca una mano bajo la mesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al fijarse en Kibellah, Vladaym adopta una expresión aburrida. Con cuidado y sin movimientos bruscos, se limpia las gafas y, con gesto distraído, coloca una mano bajo la mesa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラに気づいたヴラダイムは、すぐに退屈そうな表情を見せた。急に動くことなく慎重に、眼鏡を拭き、無心にテーブルの下に手を入れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラに気づいたヴラダイムは、すぐに退屈そうな表情を見せた。急に動くことなく慎重に、眼鏡を拭き、無心にテーブルの下に手を入れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆一注意到绮贝菈，就马上装出了一副无聊的神情。他小心翼翼地擦了擦眼镜，没有做任何突然的动作，看似心不在焉地把一只手放在了桌子下面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆一注意到绮贝菈，就马上装出了一副无聊的神情。他小心翼翼地擦了擦眼镜，没有做任何突然的动作，看似心不在焉地把一只手放在了桌子下面。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als Vladaym Kibellah bemerkt, setzt er rasch eine gelangweilte Miene auf. Ohne eine schnelle Bewegung zu machen, wischt er sorgsam seine Gläser ab und steckt wie geistesabwesend eine Hand unter den Tisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Vladaym Kibellah bemerkt, setzt er rasch eine gelangweilte Miene auf. Ohne eine schnelle Bewegung zu machen, wischt er sorgsam seine Gläser ab und steckt wie geistesabwesend eine Hand unter den Tisch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès qu'il remarque Kibellah, Vladaym se hâte d'affecter une expression ennuyée. Il se met à essuyer minutieusement ses lunettes, à gestes lents et délibérés, puis il glisse une main sous la table comme si de rien n'était.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès qu'il remarque Kibellah, Vladaym se hâte d'affecter une expression ennuyée. Il se met à essuyer minutieusement ses lunettes, à gestes lents et délibérés, puis il glisse une main sous la table comme si de rien n'était.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, Kibellah'yı fark etmesiyle birlikte hızla bıkkın bir ifadeye bürünüyor. Ani hareketler yapmadan, dikkatli bir şekilde gözlüğünü siliyor ve âdeta aklı bir karış havadaymış gibi bir elini masanın altına koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon noticing Kibellah, Vladaym quickly assumes a bored expression. Carefully, without making any sudden movements, he wipes his glasses and, as if absent-mindedly, puts a hand under the table.{/n}
